section.p: You are stripped of your money and possessions. Cross them off your Adventure Sheet. Also cross off your ship - the Uttakin scupper it. Along with the surviving members of your crew, you are locked in shackles.
The Uttakin captain looks down on you with an inscrutable stare.
‘Forget your former life,’ he advises you. ‘Now and for evermore you are a slave.’
Turn to 321 in The Court of Hidden Faces.
